 Opaque data type representing an internal XMF Parser structure.

Typedef Documentation

typedef void* XMFParser
 

Opaque data type representing an internal XMF Parser structure.

Function Documentation

SPMIDI_Error XMFParser_Create (  XMFParser **  parserPtr,
unsigned char *  xmfImage,
spmSInt32  numBytes
) 
 

Create a parser for an XMF file.

Parameters:
xmfImage address of XMF file image in memory
numBytes size of XMF file image
Returns:
0 if no error, or one of the following:
Exceptions:
SPMIDI_Error_OutOfMemory not enough free memory to allocate parser or stream

void XMFParser_Delete (  XMFParser *  parser  ) 
 

Delete the parser data.

This does not delete the in-memory image.

unsigned char* XMFParser_GetDLS (  XMFParser *  parser,
spmSInt32 *  maxSizePtr
) 
 

You must call XMFParser_Parse before calling this function.

Parameters:
maxSizePtr points to variable to receive maximum size of DLS. It may not be possible to determine the actual size of the DLS from the XMF information.
Returns:
address of DLS file within image or NULL if not found.

unsigned char* XMFParser_GetSMF (  XMFParser *  parser,
spmSInt32 *  maxSizePtr
) 
 

You must call XMFParser_Parse before calling this function.

Parameters:
maxSizePtr points to variable to receive maximum size of SMF. It may not be possible to determine the actual size of the SMF from the XMF information.
Returns:
address of SMF file within image or NULL if not found.

int XMFParser_IsXMF (  unsigned char *  xmfImage  ) 
 

Returns:
TRUE if header of xmfImage is consistent with a valid XMF header, FALSE otherwise.

SPMIDI_Error XMFParser_Parse (  XMFParser *  parser  ) 
 

This function will parse an XMF file and locate the SMF file and the DLS file.

Returns:
0 if no error, or one of the following:
Exceptions:
SPMIDI_Error_IllegalArgument parameter "parser" is null
XMFParser_Error_ParseError miscellaneous parsing error
  • FileNode does not contain ResourceFormatID, or
  • Unpacker for FileNode is unrecognized
XMFParser_Error_NotXMF file does not start with XMF file ID
XMFParser_Error_WrongType file is not XMF Type 2 (Mobile XMF)
XMFParser_Error_SizeError file length, Tree Start or Tree End in header exceed actual size

SPMIDI_Error XMFParser_ParseMobile (  unsigned char *  xmfImage,
spmSInt32  numBytes,
unsigned char **  smfImagePtr,
spmSInt32 *  maxSMFSizePtr,
unsigned char **  dlsImagePtr,
spmSInt32 *  maxDLSSizePtr
) 
 

Convenience function to parse XMF image and return SMF and DLS in one call.

Parameters:
xmfImage address of XMF file image in memory
numBytes size of XMF file image
smfImagePtr pointer to variable to recive address of SMF image.
maxSMFSizePtr points to variable to receive maximum size of SMF. It may not be possible to determine the actual size of the SMF from the XMF information.
dlsImagePtr pointer to variable to recive address of DLS image.
maxDLSSizePtr points to variable to receive maximum size of DLS. It may not be possible to determine the actual size of the DLS from the XMF information.
Returns:
0 if no error, or an error code from XMFParser_Create or XMFParser_Parse.
See also:
XMFParser_Create, XMFParser_Parse
